mapper.select: SELECT connectorid, connectorname as connectorName, mailserver as mailServer, mailbox as mailBox, mailpassword as mailPassword, mailbodyprefix as mailBodyPrefix, mailbodysuffix as mailBodySuffix FROM connectors ORDER BY connectorname

SELECT importid, importname as importName, ImportType as importType, DateField as dateField, DateFormat as dateFormat, MemoField as memoField, AmountField as amountField FROM importdef ORDER BY importname

SELECT importid, importname as importName, ImportType as importType, DateField as dateField, DateFormat as dateFormat, MemoField as memoField, AmountField as amountField FROM importdef WHERE importid = #{importID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ImportDef ( ImportName, ImportType, DateField, DateFormat, MemoField, AmountField ) VALUES ( #{importName}, #{importType}, #{dateField}, #{dateFormat}, #{memoField} #{amountField} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ImportDef SET ImportType = #{importType}, DateField = #{dateField}, DateFormat = #{dateFormat}, MemoField = #{memoField}, AmountField = #{amountField} WHERE ImportID = #{importID}
